overview:
American Kitchen Corporation offers kitchen renovation services for low and affordable prices. Its staff members are dedicated to provide exemplary service and high quality materials for the lowest available price. The company is also motivated to make North Carolina kitchens the best throughout the country.

Each project is strategically designed to emphasize a kitchen’s assets and to remove old faults. American Kitchen Corporation is most known for its ideal designs of granite counter tops, hardwood flooring, and elegant cabinetry.

More information about the kitchen renovators are available at http://www.amkico.com.
